name: @tpmjs/tools-hllm
description: HLLM API client tools for AI agents. Manage topologies, sessions, prompts, files, and more.

tools.name: executeTopology
tools.description: Execute a topology with streaming SSE response. Supports various topology types including single, sequential, parallel, map-reduce, and more.

tools.name: listSessions
tools.description: List all chat sessions for the authenticated user.

tools.name: createSession
tools.description: Create a new chat session with optional initial configuration.

tools.name: getSession
tools.description: Get details of a specific chat session including messages.

tools.name: updateSession
tools.description: Update session properties like title or configuration.

tools.name: deleteSession
tools.description: Delete a chat session and all its messages.

tools.name: addMessage
tools.description: Add a message to a chat session.

tools.name: clearMessages
tools.description: Clear all messages from a chat session.

tools.name: listPrompts
tools.description: List all prompts in the prompt library with optional filtering.

tools.name: createPrompt
tools.description: Create a new prompt in the library.

tools.name: getPrompt
tools.description: Get details of a specific prompt.

tools.name: updatePrompt
tools.description: Update an existing prompt.

tools.name: deletePrompt
tools.description: Delete a prompt from the library.

tools.name: incrementPromptUsage
tools.description: Increment the usage count for a prompt.

tools.name: getUserProfile
tools.description: Get the current user's profile information.

tools.name: updateUserProfile
tools.description: Update the current user's profile.

tools.name: getUserStats
tools.description: Get usage statistics for the current user.

tools.name: listEnvVars
tools.description: List all TPMJS environment variables.

tools.name: setEnvVar
tools.description: Set or update a TPMJS environment variable.

tools.name: deleteEnvVar
tools.description: Delete a TPMJS environment variable.

tools.name: uploadFile
tools.description: Upload a file for use in topologies.

tools.name: getFile
tools.description: Get file metadata and download URL.

tools.name: deleteFile
tools.description: Delete an uploaded file.

tools.name: listModels
tools.description: List all available AI models.

tools.name: getExecutionLogs
tools.description: Get execution logs for topology runs.

tools.name: getAgentMetrics
tools.description: Get agent performance metrics.

tools.name: listTools
tools.description: List all available TPMJS tools.

tools.name: describeTool
tools.description: Get detailed description of a specific tool.

tools.name: executeTool
tools.description: Execute a TPMJS tool directly.

tools.name: generatePrompt
tools.description: Generate a prompt using AI assistance.

tools.name: improvePrompt
tools.description: Improve an existing prompt using AI.

tools.name: exportData
tools.description: Export user data including sessions, prompts, and settings.

tools.name: importData
tools.description: Import previously exported data.

tools.name: healthCheck
tools.description: Check HLLM API health status.

tools.name: getStats
tools.description: Get public HLLM statistics.

tools.name: listApiKeys
tools.description: List all API keys for the authenticated user.

tools.name: createApiKey
tools.description: Create a new API key.

tools.name: deleteApiKey
tools.description: Delete an existing API key from the account.
